entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
